titleStmt.title: A chronicle, conteyning the liues of tenne emperours of Rome Wherin are discouered, their beginnings, procéedings, and endings, worthie to be read, marked, and remembred. Wherein are also conteyned lawes of speciall profite and policie. ... Compiled by the most famous Syr Anthonie of Gueuara, Bishop of Mondonnedo, preacher, chronicler, and counsellour to the Emperour Charles the fift: and translated out of Spanish into English, by Edward Hellowes, Groome of her Maiesties Leashe. Hereunto is also annexed a table, recapitulating such particularities, as are in this booke mentioned.
Decada de los diez Cesares y emperadores Romanos. English
titleStmt.author: Guevara, Antonio de, Bp., d. 1545?
Hellowes, Edward.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By Henry Middleton] for Ralphe Newberrie dwelling in Fleetestrete,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Una decada de los diez Cesares y emperadores Romanos.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
